tagline: Integrity Provider Data Connector for the Shibboleth Framework. You can see the details in our technical paper at
body:
This is part of the Trusted Shibboleth project. Details of the project can be seen 
on our paper here: http://csrdu.org/pub/nauman/pubs/tshib-icisa10.pdf

Contact the author for more details. For deploying shibboleth, you can refer to: 
http://csrdu.org/blog/2011/07/04/shibboleth-idp-sp-installation-configuration/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Trusted-shibboleth
